Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Jessica Emslie
Reviews.Content: The order was sent in a very timely manner and I received it at the beginning of the timeline I was given. The camera looked just like the picture online. I was very impressed. Awesome present and very happy with the purchase!!

ProductInfo.Features:
20.4MP BSI Exmor R CMOS Sensor
BIONZ Image Processor
30x Optical Zoom Lens; 24-720mm Equiv.
3.0" 921k-dot Xtra Fine LCD
Full HD 1080/60p AVCHD Video Capture
ProductInfo.Name: Sony DSC-HX50V/B DSC-HX50, HX50, DSCHX50 20.4MP Digital Camera (Black) + External Rapid Charger + 32GB SDHC Class 10 Memory Card + NP-BX1 Lion Battery + Mini HDMI to HDMI Cable + Table Top Tripod, Lens Cleaning Kit, LCD Protector + USB SDHC Reader + Memory Wallet
